Package com.komeetta.model

Class SalesOrder

java.lang.Object
com.komeetta.model.SalesOrder
@Entity public class SalesOrder extends Object
SalesOrder class represents a sales order in the database. It has the following attributes: - orderId: the unique identifier of the order - customer: the customer who placed the order - orderDate: the date and time when the order was placed - status: the status of the order (pending, in_progress, completed) - orderTotal: the total amount of the order - items: a list of items in the order
